name: Send Go4Clients DRIP (Â combination of CALL + SMS + EMAIL in any order) to new Google Sheet Spreadsheet rows
description:
When a new row is added to Google Sheets Spreadsheet, Go4Clients will send a DRIP ( combination of EMAIL + SMS + Call in any order )  to the recipient.  The call could include IVR to transfer the call to one of your sales representatives. You can close the sale immediately
The template uses [this](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1y0wCp8jhPwAxxwEsD8KF6Tzxy6s7-mQdIQ5VoXrQl40/edit?usp=sharing) example spreadsheet.
